casebody.data:
WINSTON AFFORDABLE HOUSING, L.L.C.
v.
ROBERTS 267P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 8, 2019 Liza A. Baron, Attorney at Law, for Roberts, D. Valene K. Franco, Attorney at Law, for Roberts, Deborah. Andrew Cogdell, Attorney at Law, Morganton, for Roberts, Deborah. Celia Pistolis, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Roberts, Deborah. Elliot A. Fus, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Winston Affordable Housing, L.L.C. d/b/a Winston Summit Apartments. Chad A. Archer, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Winston Affordable Housing, L.L.C. d/b/a Winston Summit Apartments.

Amended

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of July 2019 by Defendant for Temporary Stay: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of July 2019." Davis, J., Recused
